tasks.label: Deploy Lambda
tasks.command: AWS_PROFILE=ai2 sam build && sam deploy --parameter-overrides $(cat .env.json | jq -r 'to_entries | map("\(.key)=\(.value|tostring)") | .[]')

tasks.label: Test GetChallenge
tasks.command: AWS_PROFILE=ai2 sam build && sam local invoke OlmoeAttestS3LoggingFunction -e tests/get_challenge.json --parameter-overrides $(cat .env.json | jq -r 'to_entries | map("\(.key)=\(.value|tostring)") | .[]')

tasks.label: Test ShareTrace
tasks.command: AWS_PROFILE=ai2 sam build && sam local invoke OlmoeAttestS3LoggingFunction -e tests/prod_attest.json --parameter-overrides $(cat .env.json | jq -r 'to_entries | map("\(.key)=\(.value|tostring)") | .[]')
